title: Why did more rich come from poor families in the modern era? - Quora

response.answer_text: Just because the poor understands the struggle of being poor. And when you are put in hell bent situations your brain will start filling you up with strategies to overcome it. People who are keen to change their life and implement the strategies only they are the ones to become rich in life. On the other hand when we are provided with every single desire of ours we tend to become lazy and clumsy. Our brain will think “ you are getting everthing you want with just a single command so why to work and cause this suffering to yourself? Better enjoy”. And then the situation comes when all these wealth is going out of your hand, then the smart ones will think of situations to overcome it and atleast start working and a simpleton will simply get horrified and experience chaos and will end up empty handed.

First of All, Who is rich according to your view point. The people who has Money is rich ? I try to explain other viewpoint, People who has Family, Enough food, Bed to sleep and clean water, Good friends, Health is actually rich. The people who help someone in worst situations no matter in case of Support, Money, Moral side. Second thing People who belongs to poor families has great understanding values of surrounding people. They know how to handle and care of them. To make money you have to satisfied other requirement and poor has high ability to becoming rich in both point of view by Money & Heart.
